programme.title: NOVA
programme.desc: Kõigele põnevale, mis toimub koolis, trennis ja mida muidu vabal ajal iseenda või sõpradega ette võtta, annab vastused laste oma saade NOVA! Vaata meid esmaspäevast neljapäevani kas kell 16.45 või 18.45. Meie saatejuhtidele ja reporteritele saad oma ideid, soove ja küllakutseid saata e-posti nova@err.ee. Noortemagasini toimetavad Laura Kõrvits ja Lota Viik, režissöörid Kristo Veinberg ja Maarja Pärsim.

programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Džungliässad hoolitsevad pisikese eksinud koolibritibu eest.

programme.title: Jõulutöökoda
programme.desc: Seekord meisterdame kuuse alla vahva jõulusoki, mis on peale muu ka väga ilus.

programme.title: Kroonitud peakesed
programme.desc: Dašal avaldub uus võime, aga ta ei oska seda kasutada. Marleen tuleb Dašale appi, aga teised peavad teda Baba-Jagaaks.

programme.title: Siilipoiss Alfredi salapärased seiklused
programme.desc: Kobras on ärevil, sest keegi on lõhkunud tema maja. Alfred selgitab koos sõpradega välja, et süüdi on kudemispaika suunduv lõheparv.

programme.title: Ei-Ei
programme.desc: Ei-Ei on kutsutud korraga kolmele peole. Ta ei taha ühegi sõbra kutsest keelduda ja proovib kõigil pidudel osaleda.

programme.title: Jõulutaadi suured saladused
programme.desc: Mis sa arvad, kuidas ikkagi jõuab jõuluvana üheainsa õhtu jooksul kõigi maailma laste juurde kinke jagama? Mitu põhjapõtra on tema saani ees ja mitu päkapikust abilist elab tema võlulossis kaugel lumises Põhjalas? Ja kas jõulutaat vahel puhkusel ka käib? Kõigile neile ja veel paljudele teistele küsimustele leiad vastuse sellest südamlikust lastesarjast, mis toob igasse koju vahvaid laule ning mõnusa sooja jõulutuju.

programme.title: Lastetuba
programme.desc: Timmu püüab lipsu ümber kaela koomale tõmmata, kuid sõlm on nii tugevalt kinni, et see ei liigu kuidagi. Appi tõttavad Lululeluule ja Lennart. Stsenarist Gert Kiiler, lavastas Elo Selirand, mängivad Jaune Kimmel, Mart Kampus ja Aarne Soro.

programme.title: Lehm Liselotte
programme.desc: Täna teeb Liselotte koos kanadega muusikat.

programme.title: Tinka jõulumuinaslugu
programme.desc: Nillel õnnestub lapsed kuninga juurde sokutada. Lossis näevad nad midagi, mida kindlasti näha ei oleks tohtinud.

programme.title: NOVA
programme.desc: Kõigele põnevale, mis toimub koolis, trennis ja mida muidu vabal ajal iseenda või sõpradega ette võtta, annab vastused laste oma saade NOVA! programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Džungliässad hoolitsevad pisikese eksinud koolibritibu eest.

programme.title: Ei-Ei
programme.desc: Ei-Ei on kutsutud korraga kolmele peole. Ta ei taha ühegi sõbra kutsest keelduda ja proovib kõigil pidudel osaleda.

programme.title: Oravametsa lood
programme.desc: Ühel soojal suvepäeval tabas oravaid ootamatult mõte, et kui rähn on ehitusjärelevalvaja, kelleks siis nemad võiks saada.

programme.title: TV 10 olümpiastarti
programme.desc: Kergejõustiku ja paljude teiste spordialade noori motiveeriva "TV 10 olümpiastarti" sarja 51. hooaja avaetapi kokkuvõte. Võru Spordikeskuses selgusid parimad 60 meetri sprindis, teivashüppes, kõrgushüppes ja kuulitõukes. Vaatame, kus sirguvad uued tähed. "TV 10 olümpiastarti" on 1971. aastast Eesti Rahvusringhäälingu ja Eesti Kergejõustikuliidu koostöös toimuv sari, millest on esimesed võidud ja kaotused saanud Gerd Kanter, Rasmus Mägi, Ksenija Balta, Maicel Uibo, Janek Õiglane, Grit, aga ka kaardilugeja Martin Järveoja, veemotosõitja Rasmus Haugasmägi, jalgrattur Tanel Kangert jne. Saatejuht ja režissöör Anu Säärits.

programme.title: Ületamatu loomariik
programme.desc: Asudes keemia saladusi avastama, tundis inimene end maailma isandana. Ent loomariigiga võrreldes oleme ülima inseneri looduse kõrval täielikud käpardid. Jaanimardikas on avastanud soojuseta valguse, jõehobud loovad ise päikesekreemi, polaartursal on veres antifriisi ja üks väike kaheksajalg toodab piisavalt mürki, et tappa ühe hoobiga tosin inimest.

programme.title: Kaduva maailma lävel
programme.desc: 2018. aasta Eesti punase nimestiku andmeil olid pooled meie kümnest pärismaisest kahepaikseliigist ohustatud. Kõre ehk juttselg-kärnkonn on eriti ohustatud kahepaikne, kes oli veel eelmise sajandi keskel Lääne-Eesti rannikualadel ning saartel ulatuslikult levinud ja arvukas loom. Praegu elab kõre Eestis vaid viieteistkümne eraldatud populatsioonina. Kahepaiksete halva käekäigu üheks põhjuseks on märgalade ja väikeveekogude kuivendamine. Kõre elust ja rollist looduses räägib zooloog Riinu Rannap.

programme.title: Saladuslik Aafrika
programme.desc: Oleme Beninis. Hommikul teeme tiiru Nokoué järvel, kus elavad tofinud. See rahvakild põgenes maismaalt järvele Dahomey orjaküttide eest juba XVII sajandil. Ja järvel asub mitte küla, vaid lausa 2030 tuhande elanikuga linn. Ühest majast teise saab minna mõistagi üksnes paadiga. Sõidame mööda majast, kust kostab lõbus laul, trall ja pillerkaar. Kas suurejooneline pulm? Ei, selgub, et tegemist on hoopis kadunukese teise ilma ärasaatmispeoga. Aafrikas seiklesid Tiina Jokinen ja Peeter Vähi.

programme.title: Pea
programme.desc: Arthur hoiatab, et Johan ei usaldaks Maggiet. Ta arvab, et Maggie tahtis varastada tema uurimistöö. Maggie püüab juhtunut meenutada. Nilsi laiba rinnale oli lõigatud V. Mida see võiks tähendada? Ellujäänud on veendunud, et tapja on üks neist. Nende ainus võimalus on sõita lumesaaniga Argentina jaama, et abi kutsuda.

programme.title: Pea
programme.desc: Arthur avaldab, et lumest leitud laip oli Sarah Jackson, kes suri Polaris V traagilises õnnetuses. Maggie meenutab lasujärgseid hetki. Aki nõustus teda opereerima, päästes tema elu. Rühm otsustab minna vanasse jaama töökorras raadiot otsima. Maggie mõistab, et tema ja Aki jäeti meelega maha, sest tapmistel peab olema seos millegagi, mis juhtus jaamas Polaris V.

programme.title: The Spy Next Door
programme.desc: When he agreed to babysit his girlfriend's three kids, former CIA spy Bob Ho had no idea that this will end up being the most daunting task he ever took on. With three unwelcoming youngsters to win over, Bob Ho's mission gets more complicated when an old enemy arrives at his doorstep.

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
programme.desc: Two con men try to resolve the rivalry between them through a bet, by picking a young girl who inherited fifty thousand dollars to be their target. Whoever deceives her and takes the money first, is the winner.

programme.title: De-Lovely
programme.desc: A biography of Cole Carter, his musical works and his unusual relationship with his wife.

programme.title: Stone
programme.desc: Gerald “ Stone” Creeson (Edward Norton) is a convicted arsonist who is spending time in prison. Desperate to get out, Stone has his wife Lucetta (Milla Jovovich) seduce his parole officer Jack Mabrey (Robert De Niro).Stone is playing a dangerous game as his attempts at psychological manipulation could conceivably backfire at any moment – so is the gamble worth the prize.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: An action,thriller about a former criminal whose only daughter is kidnapped, forcing him to bring together his old crew to have his own justice after the police and society faileded to help him.

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: When a massive earthquake hits California and leaves it in ruins, a search-and-rescue helicopter pilot embarks on a most perilous journey to find his wife and daughter amidst the ruins.

programme.title: Backdraft II
programme.desc: The sequel to the 1991 hit follows Sean McCaffrey, a detective in the Chicago Fire Department, as he traces an arms dealer who uses fire as a distraction for his missile theft.

programme.title: House At The End Of The Street
programme.desc: After her parents separate, Elissa moves with her mother to their dream house in the country. But the dream is disturbed when they learn that the house at the end of their street was the scene of a violent crime where a girl killed her parents.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two new York detectives, through a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, gain a reputation for being among the best city-wide, but things are not exactly as they were thinking, especially when they investigate David Ershon.

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: When she starts a relationship with a seemingly perfect man, the last thing Martha expects is for him to turn out to be an assassin. When the past comes back to haunt her new beau, Martha must make a choice as she is thrust into a manic world.

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Bridget Cardigan has an easy life, until her husband, Don, loses his high-paying job, and she is forced to work to pay off his debts. She finds a job as a cleaner at the Federal Reserve Bank in Kansas, leading her to come up with a plan to steal some money in order to keep her house, together with her colleagues Nina and Jackie.

programme.desc: When a massive earthquake hits California and leaves it in ruins, a search-and-rescue helicopter pilot embarks on a most perilous journey to find his wife and daughter amidst the ruins.

programme.title: Rock of Ages
programme.desc: A small-town girl arrives in Hollywood at the height of the 1980s rock-music scene and her encounter with a boy encourages them both to pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: When a heist goes south and ends in blood, Jimmy takes his adoptive brother Eli and goes on the run from a vengeful criminal. The brothers stumble into more trouble when young Jimmy uses a mysterious weapon to save his brother, attracting the attention of both the FBI and otherworldly figures.

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: In 1963, friends with supernatural powers (Charles Xavier) and (Erik Lensherr), known as Prof. X and Magento, worked together to find all individuals with supernatural abilities but the two sides soon split, splitting their followers into two warring teams.

programme.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
programme.desc: X-Men are forced to travel to the past to try to change a very important and historic event that could negatively affect the future of mankind, as well as the future of the mutants known as X-Men.

programme.title: Dark Phoenix
programme.desc: It’s 1992, ten years after Jean Grey joined the X-Men. She begins to develop extraordinary powers that corrupt and she becomes The Dark Phoenix. Now the X-Men will have to decide if the life of a team member is worth more than all humankind.

programme.title: Europa Report
programme.desc: A Sci-fi ,adventure about a global team of astronauts going on a privately funded mission to Europa to search for life on Jupiter's biggest moon, but many unexpected surprises await them on this strange and wondrous moon.

programme.title: Grace of Monaco
programme.desc: The biopic of Hollywood starlet Grace Kelly, who married Prince Rainier III of Monaco in April 1956. The film tracks a particularly trying time, during a political dispute in the 1960s between Rainier and French President Charles De Gaulle.

programme.title: Charlotte's Web
programme.desc: When Wilbur the pig learns of the dark fate that awaits him with the approaching winter, he enlists the help of the kindly spider Charlotte to make sure that he doesn't end up as a meal at the end of the year.

programme.title: Europa Report
programme.desc: A Sci-fi ,adventure about a global team of astronauts going on a privately funded mission to Europa to search for life on Jupiter's biggest moon, but many unexpected surprises await them on this strange and wondrous moon.

programme.title: xXx: State of the Union
programme.desc: (Darius Stone), a new agent for xXx program, is sent to Washington DC to defuse the power struggle between national leaders.

programme.title: xXx: The Return of Xander Cage
programme.desc: Xander Cage returns after self-imposed exile leaving an impression that he was long dead. He secretly works with his handler, Augustus Gibbons, and his team to recover a sinister and seemingly unstoppable weapon known as Pandora's box.

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: In a mythical world, the personal revenge of the barbarian warrior Conan turns into an epic battle against all of his adversaries and enormous monsters, at the heart of impossible odds, becoming the only hope of saving the great nations of Hyboria from the domination of supernatural evil forces.

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: After his career becomes at stake, Dr. Strange (Benedict Cumberbatch) an arrogant neurosurgeon, gets a new chance in life, where a great sorcerer trains him in order to protect the world from evil.(n)

programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: In exchange for his own freedom, a bounty hunter is assigned by the U.S millitary to stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.(n)

programme.title: Wild
programme.desc: With her life in shambles, Cheryl seeks a way out of her downward spiral by going on a solo hike on a journey of self-discovery and reevaluation of priorities.

programme.title: The Impossible
programme.desc: A young British family vacationing in Thailand is suddenly torn apart when the devastating 2004 tsunami tears through their seaside resort. Their devoted search for one another is a testament to the human spirit and the power of family.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: Will Smith and son Jaden co-star as the legendary Cypher and son Kitai, who crash land on an abandoned Earth a millennium after humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, teenage Kitai has to brave the hostile environment, brimming with aggressive evolved animal species and aliens, on his own to look for help.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe.

programme.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: Before the events of Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope, and after the founding of the Galactic Empire, a group of rebels planned to carry out a very difficult task, which is to steal the charts of the Star of Death, a deadly weapon with high destructive power, which is owned by the empire.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: After the events of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, the heroes continue their grand adventure, which reveals to them many of the mysteries of the past with regard to power.

programme.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: The adventures of Han Solo and Chewbacca before joining the Rebellion and their encounters with the famous gambler Lando Calrissian, in a journey that will set the course of one of the Star Wars saga's most unlikely heroes.

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: When the couple Susan and Daniel take a vacation in the Caribbean, their dream holiday turns into a nightmare, when they become stranded in the middle of the ocean during a scuba diving trip. As they have to battle to stay alive while bloodthirsty sharks surround them.

programme.title: Wild
programme.desc: With her life in shambles, Cheryl seeks a way out of her downward spiral by going on a solo hike on a journey of self-discovery and reevaluation of priorities.

programme.title: Where the Wild Things Are
programme.desc: Max is a young boy with an active imagination, when an accident happens to his sister Claire and her friends, he runs away dressed as a wolf in an imaginary world. Living with animals in the forest ,he meets Carol, who is very much like Max,he proclaims himself a king and magically fix their problems.

programme.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: Before the events of Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope, and after the founding of the Galactic Empire, a group of rebels planned to carry out a very difficult task, which is to steal the charts of the Star of Death, a deadly weapon with high destructive power, which is owned by the empire.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe.

programme.title: Tarzan
programme.desc: The story of Tarzan, a young man who grew up in a family of gorillas, after his parents were killed by a leopard named Sabor. The gorillas raise him to grow up in their midst, and he becomes their hero after killing Sabor.

programme.title: Into the Storm
programme.desc: The town of Silverton is devastated by a wave of deadly tornadoes, and storm trackers predict the worst is yet to come. Meanwhile, a group of high school students document the events and aftermath of the disaster.

programme.title: Only the Brave
programme.desc: The film tells the story of a group of firefighters from the city of Prescott, Arizona, who responded to a massive fire in the city of Yarnell in June 2013, where the fires reached 19 members from the fire department team.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: This thriller recounts how the U.S. container ship, the Maersk Alabama, headed by Captain Richard Phillips (Tom Hanks), became the first American ship to be hijacked in two hundred years when they come head to head with Somali pirates.

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Base on a true story, that took place on January 15, 2009, when the American pilot (Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger) who managed to forced landing his plane above the Hudson River and saved the lives of 155 passengers on the plane, but despite his heroism and large risk in landing on the Hudson River, the disaster didn't end, where blowing winds from the authorities may destroy the live of the pilot himself.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: FBI Hostage Rescue Team leader and U.S. war veteran Will Sawyer now assesses security for skyscrapers. He sets out on an assignment in China, where the tallest and safest building suddenly ablaze. Will must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family who are trapped inside the building.

programme.title: Once
programme.desc: A struggling musician crosses path with an immigrant girl in Dublin, and together they share their love for music while gradually falling in love with each other.

programme.title: You're Not You
programme.desc: A classical pianist named Kate develops amyotrophic sclerosis, her social and psychological condition worsens, especially after her marriage is about to fail. She meets aspiring rock singer Bec, who volunteers to take care of her. Despite Kate's total reliance on Bec, they each have a different outlook on life.

programme.title: The Lucky One
programme.desc: A marine finds a picture in Iraq that helps him survive the dramatic battles. Getting back home, he tracks the girl in the picture which leads him to Louisiana. There he meets her and tries to explain his motives to find her.

programme.title: August: Osage County
programme.desc: The strong-willed women of the Weston family find themselves heading back to their childhood Oklahoma house, and the eccentric woman who raised them, following a family crisis. The events reveal many aspects of this family and the problems facing the women and their mother.

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: Howard Inlet, a successful New York advertising executive, suffers a great tragedy and retreats from his social life. While his concerned friends try desperately to reconnect with him, he seeks answers from the universe by writing letters to Love, Time and Death. But it's not until his notes bring unexpected responses from three unique visitors that he begins to understand how these three constants interlock in a life fully lived, and how even the deepest loss can reveal moments of meaning and beauty.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
programme.desc: X-Men are forced to travel to the past to try to change a very important and historic event that could negatively affect the future of mankind, as well as the future of the mutants known as X-Men.

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks
programme.desc: The teenage Cody Banks becomes a part of a special division of the CIA. With information needed about the nefarious plans of an organization called ERIS, Cody is sent to infiltrate the house of one of the organization's scientists, by transferring into his daughter's school and befriending her.

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: Ricky, a corrupt cop with the dream of becoming mayor, finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at a major boxing event. He tries to uncover the shocking murder plot, which becomes more shocking upon knowing its mastermind.

programme.title: Thor: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Thor is imprisoned on the other side of the universe, where he finds himself racing against time to stop Ragnarök and the almighty Hela, who threatens to demolish his home Asgard.

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.

programme.title: The Tourist
programme.desc: An unwitting American tourist named Frank finds himself in the midst of an intense pursuit that involves various European police forces and a gang of Belarusians among other parties. A seemingly minor error causes Frank to be mistaken for a man wanted by law authorities and mafia men alike.

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: Two cops partner up in order to uncover how a group of bank robbers managed to escape from a bank during a heist that apparently has other motives than just stealing money.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: A film director's plans to shoot his upcoming war movie in the jungle quickly go south when the film crew faces a series of complications, from land mines to local drug lords.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: The Irish lady, Deirdre, forms a team of specialized mercenaries to retrieve a mysterious suitcase from dangerous criminals. After they successfully complete the mission, the suitcase gets switched by a member of the team who wants to sell it to the Russians.

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: When a CIA agent is killed in a mission gone south, the agency recruits his previously-unknown identical twin brother, a street hustler, to take his place. A veteran agent is entrusted with his training and with convincing him to take on the dangerous mission.

programme.title: Thor: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Thor is imprisoned on the other side of the universe, where he finds himself racing against time to stop Ragnarök and the almighty Hela, who threatens to demolish his home Asgard.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: In the Hawaiian Islands, an international naval engage an intense battle against an alien species known as "The Regents". The aliens come to planet Earth to build a power source in the ocean.

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A drone repairman (Tom Cruise) is sent back to an evacuated Earth where a human-alien war sixty years ago wiped out half the planet. He makes a shocking discovery that causes him to question everything he knows about his world, his mission and himself.

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Based on real life events in 1996, about a group of mountain climbers who have decided to challenge the hardest climate conditions on the globe and climb Everest. The climbing trip turned to be a deadly adventure due to a storm, which changed everything.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A seventh installment to the series, with events taking place thirty years after the Battle of Endor and the events portrayed in Return of the Jedi.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: The Naval Fighter Weapons School witnesses a fierce competition between two students, nicknamed Maverick and Iceman, as they try to win the school's top trophy.

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: After a case of high-level computer hacking arises, a man is released from prison to help American and Chinese authorities pursue a mysterious cyber criminal. The cat-and-mouse chase leads them from the U.S.A to Hong Kong.

programme.title: Sicario
programme.desc: In the border stretching between Mexico and the U.S.A, an area that has been always out of the reach of law, an idealistic FBI agent is assigned to aid in the escalating war against the cartel.

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: A gang plans a big heist with a group of corrupt cops, by calling in a 999 dispatch, which is code for “officer down” to lure out a rookie officer, in order for them to pull-off their heist – their plan take unforeseen turns when an unsuspected member has a change of mind.

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: Set in a dystopian future where crime rates have become insanely high, evil corporation Omni Consumer Products tries to create a prototype that is half-robot and half-human. When RoboCop learns about their intrigues, he turns on his masters.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
programme.desc: As he attempts to rescue Princess Leia from Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker teams up with Han Solo and two droids to find the princess and destroy a powerful weapon made by the Galactic Empire.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
programme.desc: As the Imperial fleet launches an attack on the Rebel Alliance base in Hoth, the spirit of Obi-Wan Kenobi sends Luke Skywalker to train under Yoda.

programme.title: Automation
programme.desc: When AUTO, a workspace robot, finds out that another advanced model will be taking his place, his fear of destruction drives him to a devastating rampage as he tries to protect his existence, leaving the factory workers scrambling to find safety and put an end to the killing spree.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: In 79 A.D., a slave turned gladiator races against time to save his beloved from marrying a corrupt Roman Senator, as Mount Vesuvius erupts in the Roman city of Pompeii.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy 2
programme.desc: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 continues the team's adventures as they traverse the outer reaches of the cosmos. The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mysteries of Peter Quill's true parentage. Old foes become new allies and favorite characters from the classic comics will come to the Guardians' aid as the Marvel cinematic universe continues to expand.

programme.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
programme.desc: Now in his twenties, John Connor is being hunted by a new female terminator, the T-X. A CSM-101 terminator is sent back in time to protect him just as the machines start to take over the world.

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: United Nations employee, Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt), must leave his family and traverse the world in a race against time to stop a Zombie pandemic that is crumbling armies and governments in its wake.

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead
programme.desc: An overworked paramedic begins to hallucinate over a three-night shift. As he is haunted by the ghosts of those he failed to save, he must fight to hold onto his sanity.(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: In an apocalyptic world, prisoner Jensen Ames is forced to participate in a car race that is unlike any other. It's a race between armored cars on Terminal Island. In order to win the race, you must brutalize and murder all other competitors. But what if it's merely a trap.(n)

programme.desc: Irfan is an idealistic professor who gets out of a job and he is in a dilemma as the doors close one by one in his face and he has to find a way to look after his sick son, even if this means getting into an inescapable dark adventure.

Eventually, he launches a website with his friend Eduardo that allows people to look up their friends without violating privacy.

programme.title: S.M.A.R.T. Chase
programme.desc: When he gets ambushed during a mission to transport a precious Chinese antique, a private security agent must fight his way through brutal thugs to reclaim what he has lost; both the antique and his reputation.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Joanna and Walter are a married couple who are facing problems. As they move to an upscale community called Stepford as a last resort to save their marriage, they are shocked to discover that their idealistic vision of a community is hiding a dark secret.(n)

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Irfan is an idealistic professor who gets out of a job and he is in a dilemma as the doors close one by one in his face and he has to find a way to look after his sick son, even if this means getting into an inescapable dark adventure.(n)

programme.title: The Bookshop
programme.desc: In 1959, Florence Green, a free-spirited widow, risks everything to open a bookshop, but she enters into clashes with the residents who never expected to lay hands on such venturesome books.(n)

programme.title: The Birthday Wish
programme.desc: When Gwen's plans to get engaged on her 30th birthday fall through, she makes a wish to be able to see into the future. But instead of offering answers, her glimpse into the future sends her into a tailspin as it raises questions about whether she is with the right man.

programme.title: Rust Creek
programme.desc: On her way for a job interview, a college student takes a wrong turn and is stranded in the forest where she has to battle cruel forces and ruthless outlaws before she strikes a deal with a stranger to secure a way out of the woods.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: The three Musketeers team up with the lively D'Artagnan to defeat the forces of evil and stop the many attempts to seize the French throne.

programme.title: The Flood
programme.desc: An immigration officer finds herself in a tight spot as the fate of an asylum seeker lies in her hand, while flashbacks of his journey out of his homeland are portrayed.

programme.title: Six Days, Seven Nights
programme.desc: While taking a vacation with her boyfriend , Journalist Robin Monroe hires a plane driven by drunk pilot Quinn Harris to cover a story on an nearby island. The two don't get along at first, but when the plane crashes on a deserted island, Robin and Quinn have to face many dangers and adventures together.

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Rubin Carter is a middleweight boxer who managed to escape the tragedies and sufferings of his childhood. He is hopeful about the future, but his hopes are thwarted when he is accused of murder and imprisoned.(c)

programme.title: Romeo Is Bleeding
programme.desc: Jack Grimaldi is a crooked cop, taking bribes and dealing with corrupt gangsters, and at the same time he cheats on his wife with many women. He meets Russian assassin Mona Demarkov, and thinks he can manipulate her in his own way, but she plays him mercilessly.(c)

programme.title: 2 Days in Paris
programme.desc: In an attempt to breathe some life back into their relationship, Marion and Jack decide to leave New York for a trip across Europe. But little do they know that their stay in Paris will be complicated by the presence of Marion's overbearing parents, as well as the appearance of several of her old flames.(c)

programme.title: How To Lose A Guy In 10 Days
programme.desc: Journalist Andie Anderson specializes in writing topics of interest to women, but she wants to write about other things. She makes a deal with her boss that she would be free to write what she wants if she can write an article about what girls do wrong to spoil their relationship with guys.(c)

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: Inspired by his ex-wife's memoirs, events revolve around the stunning story of the life and achievements of the inspiring physicist Stephen Hawking, despite his motor neurone disease, with a special focus on his relationship with his ex-wife, Jane Wilde.(c)

programme.title: Crypto
programme.desc: Following a demotion, a Wall Street banker manages to find clues that unravel a global conspiracy. As he dives into the layers of corruption taking over New York, he soon finds his career, his life, and his family in peril.(c)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: Chuck works at a large courier company, and is in love with his girlfriend, Kelly. He plans to propose to her on Christmas, but is required to go to Malaysia for an urgent work assignment. The plane he's on crashes on the way, leaving Chuck as the only survivor on a deserted island, where it is up to him to protect both his own body and his own mind, by holding on to dreams of getting back.(c)

programme.title: All Creatures Here Below
programme.desc: After running into trouble, the struggling young couple Gensan and Ruby seek refuge in their hometown of Kansas City, where they're faced with dark secrets from the past.(c)

programme.title: Zookeeper
programme.desc: When the zookeeper decides to quit winning back his ex-girlfriend, the animals try to teach him the ways of love.(c)

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: Ferris pretends to be sick so he doesn't go to school, and he persuades his girlfriend Sloane and his friend Cameron to go to Chicago to spend time there to help him heal. The triple go with the car of Cameron's father, and events take a comic turn.(c)

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: The friendship and faith of a priest and a rabbi are tested when they both fall for an old friend. As both men struggle between upholding their duties and following their hearts.(c)

programme.title: A Dog's Breakfast
programme.desc: Patrick is a single man who lives with his dog Mars. When his sister visits to introduce him to her TV star fiancé, things spiral out of control when Patrick thinks that he might've killed him by mistake.(c)

programme.title: Romy And Michele's High School Reunion
programme.desc: Rummy and Mitchell are high school friends, who do not separate even when they have been ridiculed and harassed by their classmates. When they are invited to the reunion ceremony ten years after graduation, they discover that their lives are not as good as they wanted, so they decide to go to school with businessmen clothes, mobile phones and fake success stories. Hence many paradoxes.(c)

programme.title: What's Love Got to Do with It
programme.desc: The story of Tina Turner's rise to stardom, from her unhappy upbringing, to her meeting her future husband, pop star Ike Turner, to their troubled relationship as Ike grows abusive.(c)

programme.title: Into the Blue 2: The Reef
programme.desc: When they are hired by an investor to look for Columbus' hidden treasure under the sea, married couple Sebastian and Dani find themselves in the midst of a large conspiracy when they discover that the treasure is actually a nuclear warhead.(c)

programme.title: It's a Hard Truth Ain't It
programme.desc: A documentary that follows 13 inmates at Indiana's Pendleton Correctional Facility as they learn filmmaking so as to tell their stories that ended with their incarceration.(c)

programme.title: All Creatures Here Below

programme.desc: When the zookeeper decides to quit winning back his ex-girlfriend, the animals try to teach him the ways of love.(c)

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: Ferris pretends to be sick so he doesn't go to school, and he persuades his girlfriend Sloane and his friend Cameron to go to Chicago to spend time there to help him heal. The triple go with the car of Cameron's father, and events take a comic turn.(c)

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: The friendship and faith of a priest and a rabbi are tested when they both fall for an old friend. As both men struggle between upholding their duties and following their hearts.(c)

programme.title: A Dog's Breakfast
programme.desc: Patrick is a single man who lives with his dog Mars. When his sister visits to introduce him to her TV star fiancé, things spiral out of control when Patrick thinks that he might've killed him by mistake.(c)

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: The story follows the journey of the ambitious boxer Midge Kelly from his humble beginnings until his rise to fame, as he stops at nothing to get what he wants.(c)

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: The biography of mathematician John Forbes Nash, Jr. (Russell Crowe) since he was a university student, through his academic work and research achievements, his love story with his student Alicia (Jennifer Connelly) who became his wife and his bitter struggle with paranoid schizophrenia.(c)

programme.title: Throw Momma from the Train
programme.desc: Miserable literature teacher and author Larry and his no-less-miserable student Owen make a bizarre deal; Larry is to kill Owen’s overbearing mother, whereas Owen is to kill Larry’s evil ex-wife.(c)

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: Dantes is falsely accused by his best friend Fernand and is imprisoned in an island prison for 13 years. Dantes escapes and transforms himself into a rich count and dreams of only one thing: revenge.(c)

programme.title: The Founder
programme.desc: The true story of how one man, Ray Kroc, turned a burger joint into one of the biggest food-chains in the world, turning McDonald's from a small, albeit popular, walk-up restaurant run by the brothers Mac and Dick McDonald into a franchise worth billions.(c)

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a prostitute-turned-actress and decides to professionally adopt her, while she in turn is having another affair simultaneously with the writer of the play they're working on.(c)

programme.title: The Place Beyond the Pines
programme.desc: A motorcycle stunt rider (Ryan Gosling) makes a fateful decision to carry out robberies to support his girlfriend and baby. When a rookie cop (Bradley Cooper) pursues him, the two become locked on a tense collision course whose devastating consequences will impact their families for years to come.(c)

programme.title: The Last King of Scotland
programme.desc: The film deals with the life of the Ugandan dictator ( Idi Amin) and his brutality from the point of view of his own physician during the 1970s.(c)

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: Chili Palmer returns back to the music business after years of working in the movie industry, and decides to help Edie Athens, his friend's widow, revive her late husband's record company, to pay of a debt owed to a producer. Chili depends on singer and songwriter Linda Moon's talents who asks him to help her cancel her contract with Nick Carr and Raji, who quickly become Chili's enemies.(n)

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: Based on a true story; a retelling of the negotiations that took place against the backdrop of the Oslo Peace Accords in the 1990s between the Palestinian Liberation Organization and the government of Israel in which Norway acted as an intermediary.

programme.title: 2 Hearts
programme.desc: The story of two couples from different times whose lives are intertwined by a special connection that will forever change their fates.

programme.title: Paper Spiders
programme.desc: In the wake of losing her husband, Dawn experiences growing anxiety after she learns that her daughter, Melanie, is moving away for college, after which Melanie attempts to help her mother with her paranoid delusions that threaten to jeopardize their loving bond.

programme.title: Big Time Adolescence
programme.desc: As the teenager college student Mo is taken by his best friend Zeke, the fail out drug dealer, into the world of partying and dealing drugs, Mo’s father reconsiders the upbringing of his son and takes strict decisions to end Mo and Zeke's friendship for good.

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: A boxer travels with his brother, who is managing him, for a final boxing match. But when an unexpected travel companion joins them, truths and cracks in the two brothers' relationship come to the surface.

programme.title: The Sisters Brothers
programme.desc: Gold prospector Hermann Kermit Warm, is being chased from Oregon desert to San Francisco by the infamous assassins Eli and Charlie Sisters. But Eli is starting to have second thoughts about his life of crime.

programme.title: Seized
programme.desc: When his son gets kidnapped by a mysterious entity, former special forces agent Niro finds himself embroiled in a dangerous situation, as he must take out three dangerous crime syndicates in order to get his son back.

programme.title: The Bee Gees: How Can You Mend A Broken Heart

programme.title: Secrets in the Snow
programme.desc: Excited about finally meeting her beloved Ted's family in a snowy countryside, Christina makes her way from Chicago only to be surprised at an unexpected visit from a guest who is holding secrets behind the death of Ted's brother, Paul.

programme.title: Love at the Shore
programme.desc: In an attempt to finish her new novel, single mom Jenna decides to seize the chance of their beach vacation to meet her deadline. But fate has a way of interfering with even the best-laid plans, as Jenna comes to find out when her neighbor, the surfer Lucas, proves a detriment to her progress.

programme.title: Mighty Oak
programme.desc: Years after her brother dies, Gina runs across the music prodigy Oak Scoggins. While anyone would only be taken by Oak's talent, Gina sets her eyes on reuniting her old band as she becomes convinced that Oak is actually the reincarnation of her late brother.

programme.title: Psych 2: Lassie Come Home
programme.desc: Police Chief Lassiter is ambushed and left for dead, after which Shawn and Gus leave San Francisco to help him, only to find themselves unwelcome in Santa Barbara as they contemplate a scheme to unravel a case about the supernatural.

programme.title: Let's Meet Again on Christmas Eve
How to Build a Girl
programme.desc: As she tries to find a way to help her impoverished family, the teenage Johanna Morrigan takes on the persona of a worldly music critic named Dolly Wilde.

programme.title: Light of My Life
programme.desc: The journey of a father and daughter, through a society that is dying after an epidemic has killed half the world's population, especially women, and through a series of events that test the human personality, the father seeks to protect his daughter and maintain their friendship.

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life
programme.desc: Now a police inspector, Marcus Burnett teams up with Mike Lowery as they face off against a pair of drug lords, who are, in fact, a mother and a son, all while previous vendettas are chasing them.

programme.title: Hooking Up
programme.desc: After Bailey, a cancer patient, and Darla, a recovering sex addict, cross paths, they decide to go on a road trip together, each with their ulterior motives.

programme.title: In the Key of Love
programme.desc: After walking away from her former life to take over her grandmother's wedding photography business, the past comes calling for Maggie when she is hired for the wedding of her ex-boyfriend's sister. It turns out that there is still a spark between the two, just waiting to be reignited.

Just What the Doctor Ordered
programme.desc: When a fire breaks out in the prison for the mentally ill, Dr. Albert Beck runs away and takes a shelter in an abandoned house, after which he's surprised to find that his hideout is the new house of a woman and her 18-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Secrets in the Woods
programme.desc: While on a romantic trip with her boyfriend in the woods, Sandra uncovers a dark secret about his father.

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life
programme.desc: Now a police inspector, Marcus Burnett teams up with Mike Lowery as they face off against a pair of drug lords, who are, in fact, a mother and a son, all while previous vendettas are chasing them.

programme.title: Late Night
programme.desc: When a late-night talk-show host is in danger of losing her job, she hires a new woman writer, Molly, to join her only-male writing team. Molly's determination to prove her talent in a male-dominant environment has unexpected results on both Katherine's career and personal life.

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: When he learns that his old sweetheart, Lillian, has been diagnosed with Alzheimer’s disease and taken to a senior center, the ageing, lovesick widower Claude hatches a plan to be reunited with her.

programme.title: Adventures of a Mathematician
programme.desc: Based on a true story; in the 1930s, Stan Ulam, a Polish-born mathematician, travels to the United States, where he joins the Manhattan Project and helps create the first computer.

programme.title: After The Wedding
programme.desc: Isabel runs an orphanage in the Indian city of Kolkata, but she desperately needs money to keep the shelter in place, she travels to New York City to meet a benefactor who might help her with funding.

programme.title: Green Book
programme.desc: In 1962, Tony "Tony Lip” (Viggo Mortensen), an Italian-American tough bouncer, is hired to be the driver for the African-American classical pianist Dr. Don Shirley (Mahershala Ali) for a concert tour into the Deep South states. Because of America's racial segregation, Shirley relies on The Negro Motorist Green Book to guide them to small hotels, restaurants and gas stations. As the disparate pair witness and endure America's appalling injustices on the road, they find a newfound respect for each that opens their eyes to the world around them.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: After the mysterious brutal death of her colleague during a routine traffic stop, Officer Renee tries to understand the supernatural secret behind everything that's happening, and the danger that haunts her everywhere.(n)

programme.title: Swiped: Hooking Up In The Digital Age

programme.desc: Olivia is a bright student and head of her school's cheerleading team who's harboring a scandalous secret. As Olivia starts pulling away from her mother, the latter grows concerned and sets about trying to get to the bottom of the matter, uncovering a shocking truth.(n)

programme.title: Wendy

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: Adaline Bowman (Blake Lively) is born in the early 1920s. After an accident, she becomes ageless. She remains 29 years old for eight decades, and after years of isolation, she meets a man who rekindles her passion for life. She spends a weekend with his parents, and finds her secret threatened.

programme.title: Anniversary Nightmare
programme.desc: When she wakes up on her 10th anniversary and finds herself in Hawaii, things rapidly escalate for Liz as she finds her husband dead while she is accused of murdering him. She sets out to prove herself innocent by finding the true culprit.

programme.title: Share
programme.desc: When she accidentally discovers a disturbing video from a night she can't remember, 16-year-old Mandy tries to figure out what happened and how quickly everything came down around her.

programme.title: The Convenient Groom
programme.desc: When Kate's fiancé leaves her, she finds herself in a dilemma since their publicized marriage is about to happen, and the issue could threaten her image as a relationship expert. A childhood friend, who harbors a secret crush on her, steps up as a replacement groom to help her save face.

programme.title: The Limehouse Golem
programme.desc: When horrific murders occur one after the other, some people start to think that the myth Golem is the cause for all these misfortunes.(c)

programme.title: Kinky
programme.desc: Dr. Joyce Carmichael has always been unlucky in love. Despite a successful career, she struggles to maintain a relationship. But when she meets Darrin, their relationship opens the doors of her sexual desires, as the two enter the foray of the world of BDSM.(c)

programme.title: Waiting for Anya
programme.desc: As WWII rages on, a young shepherd teams up with a reclusive widow to smuggle Jewish children to safety by transporting them from France to Spain.(c)

programme.title: Mermaids
programme.desc: The bond between a mother and her two daughters is tested and reshaped after the mother moves them to a small town in Massachusetts for a fresh start.(c)

programme.title: How To Lose A Guy In 10 Days
programme.desc: Journalist Andie Anderson specializes in writing topics of interest to women, but she wants to write about other things. She makes a deal with her boss that she would be free to write what she wants if she can write an article about what girls do wrong to spoil their relationship with guys.(c)

programme.title: Deadly Assistant
programme.desc: Amanda is left reeling from the sudden death of her sister Lauren. When she grows to suspect foul play in her death, she is shocked when evidence points to Lauren's own son, Charlie, sending Amanda on a journey to search for the truth about her sister's family.(c)

programme.title: Dead Over Diamonds: Picture Perfect Mysteries
programme.desc: When a diamond necklace is stolen, Det. Sam enlists the help of the photographer Allie to find it. The last thing they expect during their investigation is for it to point them straight to an unexpected death.(c)

programme.title: You Again
programme.desc: Marni is a successful businesswoman who returns to her hometown for the marriage of her older brother. She finds that he's about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school. Things get worse when Marni's mother comes face-to-face with the girl's aunt, who was also bothering her in high school.(c)

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery
programme.desc: Hailey Dean, who was working in the attorney general's office, decides to quit her job to work as a counselor in marital affairs and a psychiatrist.(c)

programme.title: Dream House Nightmare
programme.desc: What was supposed to be a lucky purchase for a married couple turns into a nightmare when they discover that their dream house is coveted by an unstable woman who is willing to do anything to force them out.(c)

programme.title: Official Secrets
programme.desc: In the run-up to the invasion of Iraq, British Intelligence whistle-blower Katharine Gun leaked a memo about a joint spying between the US and UK, proposing to blackmail smaller member states to vote for the war in Iraq. Journalist Martin Bright published that document in The Observer newspaper and the Security Council was outraged.(c)

programme.desc: Two sisters are discovered in a decrepit cabin after having gone missing for five years following their mother's murder. They move in with their uncle and his girlfriend, who can't help but fear the girls aren't the only new guests in their home.(c)

programme.desc: A troubled divorcée gets tangled up in a dangerous web of secrets and lies, after she witnesses something shocking while taking the train.(c)

programme.desc: Set in the future beyond the solar system, a group of criminals accept a space mission in which they become subjects of a human reproduction experiment. But they find themselves in an unthinkable position when their space ship hits a storm of cosmic rays.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: Based in Mexico, ex-FBI agent John Creasy is hired to protect nine-year-old Pita Ramos, who gets kidnapped. Creasy swears to stop at nothing to get revenge from her kidnappers.

programme.title: Beast
programme.desc: A troubled woman living in a secluded society finds herself torn between the control of her oppressive family and the attraction of an outsider suspected of being behind a series of brutal killings.

War doesn't end when one goes home. After being discharged from the marines, Nelson Sanchez's homecoming brings with it a reckoning as he is forced to finally confront the violent past that he has been trying to forget.(n)

programme.title: Jawbone
programme.desc: After hitting rock bottom, former youth boxing champion Jimmy McCabe returns to his childhood boxing club, where he's guided by gym owner Bill and corner-man Eddie to get back in the game and regain his former glory.(n)

programme.desc: On the Amazon river, a documentary crew is set upon by a dangerous man who claims to know the location of the tribe they want to film. However, as the man misleads them into dangerous territory, they come to discover that he is on the hunt for a deadly Anaconda, placing them all in peril.(n)

programme.desc: Shaw is a secret agent working for the United Nations to keep things peaceful and cooperative. Shaw gets unwillingly involved in the crime, and starts to look for the true criminal to remove suspicions from himself.(n)

programme.title: The Remains
programme.desc: An unsuspecting family moves to an old Victorian home, unaware that a chest in their attic has antiques possessed by an evil spirit that soon possesses each family member as it grows stronger and nearly achieves its malevolent goal: to kidnap the children.(n)

programme.title: Possum
programme.desc: Phillip, a puppeteer, has a troubled past and a fixation on a creepy puppet that he works with. When he is forced to confront his past and his evil step-father after he returns to his childhood home, he soon comes to discover that confronting the demons of his past can have dire consequences.(n)

On their tail comes the Fire Nation who wage war on the Earth Kingdom and the Water Tribes.(n)

programme.title: American Hustle
programme.desc: In the late 1970s, FBI agent Richie DiMaso forces con artists Irving and Sydney to devise an elaborate sting operation on corrupt politicians.(n)

programme.title: The Boondock Saints II: All Saints Day
programme.desc: After assassinating Italian mob boss, Joe Yakavetta, the MacManus brothers, Connor and Murphy, along with their father Noah, fled to Ireland. Soon his lies, deceits and strange behavior have everyone asking the same dark question: Did Nick Dunne kill his wife.

programme.desc: A group consisting of a fire-fighting cadet, two college professors, and a scientist work together when an alien organism that enters Earth in a meteor continues to evolve in our world.
